description: a standards-based, open source product that enables discovery and use of geospatial resources including data and services.

description: is an OGC CSW server implementation written in Python.

name: GeoNode
description: is a web-based application and platform for developing geospatial information systems (GIS) and for deploying spatial data infrastructures (SDI). It is designed to be extended and modified, and can be integrated into existing platforms.

name: Repository
description: is an ESRI toolbox and tool(s) that export ESRI Feature Classes to open data formats, CSV, JSON, and GeoJSON.

name: SpatialSearch
description: is a RESTful API that allows the user to query geographic entities by latitude and longitude, and extract data.

name: DKAN
description: a Drupal based open data platform.

name: The Digital Analytics Program (DAP)
description: offers advanced, easy Web analytics to federal agencies.

name: qu
description: is a data platform created to serve public data sets. This is a public domain work of the US Government.

name: Tabula
description: is a tool for liberating data tables locked inside PDF files.

name: HMDA tools
description: import and analyze mortgage application data.
